description: Lead plant (Amorpha canescens) is truly amazing! It boasts vibrant dark grey-green leaflets and dainty light sprays of pale purple flowers that bloom in mid-summer, providing a welcome display of beauty to its environment. Its drought-tolerant nature makes it easy-care and resilient, as well as an ideal fit for hot and dry spots in the garden. It attracts wildlife, including birds and butterflies, with its fragrant blooms and decorative foliage, making it the perfect choice for any garden. It is also surprisingly hardy and can endure a wide range of temperatures and habitat conditions. This perennial is an outstanding addition to any landscape.
